channel.title: Pointing out Something to you noobs
channel.description:
Ok listen you newbs, Im getting sick and tired of you guys posting topics that are meaningless. Don't post topics saying "OMFG NEED HELP PLZ!!!". Just state your problem, just because your words are capitalized doesn't mean people will go to your topic. I'm sure there's more people who want this solution to be solved. Seriously guys, If you need help you don't need to write Symbols in your topic name or Capitalized words, just write your problem. For example, "NpcHandler Problem.". Now the topic will be read by the people who know how to mess with the NpcHanlder. Isn't that simpler?
Now post like a person in need, not an obsessed person.
